title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Thursday 30 July 2015 - BBC News
summary: an investigation into claims ex-mp cyril smith was found with child abuse images has been closed due to a lack of evidence .
prosecution and defence teams have been summing up in the murder trial of danny beaumont , accused of stabbing his friend to death .
the new chief constable of northamptonshire police says he supports a combined police and fire service .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: have a good evening
text: that 's all from local live for today .
we 've been talking about the late mp cyril smith .
an investigation into claims the former rochdale mp was found with child abuse images in his car boot
and we 've brought the news that newcastle united are
join us again tomorrow from 08:00 .
author: Craig Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: fifty jobs being created in corby
text: utility bidder - which helps business customers find cheaper gas and electricity providers - is moving to the corby .
managers say they 've outgrown their original base in market harborough and will move to corby in september .
they 'll be based at the pearson academy on bangrave road .
the company is looking to double its staffing levels and increase the services it provides .
managing director , james longley , says the relocation `` reflects the rapid expansion of the business '' .
an open evening for job hunters will take place at 18:00 on 12 august at the pearson academy .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Northampton

documents.title: kettering east development named
text: the kettering east development - which is earmarked for 5,500 homes - has been given a new name .
house builders and marketing experts have agreed to call the development hanwood park .
it refers to the historic manor of barton hanrad , which existed near barton seagrave .
the new name will be used to sell the new houses once they are built .
the first building to be completed on the new development is the hayfield cross primary school , due to open in september .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Northampton

documents.title: hull completes first round
text: burton latimer golfer charley hull has completed her first round in the
two birdies , but three bogies mean hull is eight shots off the lead , held by korea 's hyo joo kim at 7-under-par .
author: BBC Sport

the video was trending on facebook and has been shared many times on social media .

documents.title: cyril smith : mp danczuk critical of 'self-congratulatory ' simmonds
text: the mp who claimed former liberal parliamentarian cyril smith had been stopped by northamptonshire police on the m1 with a boot full of child abuse images has criticised the county 's police and crime commissioner .
northamptonshire police has

but the labour mp said : `` i accept incidents like this are difficult to investigate but if police had investigated cyril properly in the first place , which everyone now acknowledges did n't happen , then we would n't have police commissioners congratulating themselves for failing to prove the m1 incident did n't take place . ''
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News Online

documents.title: cyril smith m1 claim 'not disproved '
text: mp simon danczuk , who claimed the late cyril smith mp was stopped on the m1 in northamptonshire with child abuse images in his car , has said the claim had not been disproved and he would not apologise .
northamptonshire police and crime commissioner adam simmonds has asked for an apology from mr danczuk after northamptonshire police

mr danczuk said : `` adam admits the police can not disprove [ the m1 claims ] and what he does n't acknowledge is it 's beyond doubt cyril smith was investigated by [ unspecified uk ] police for possession of obscene publications . ''
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News Online

documents.title: northants police 'maligned ' by cyril smith claims
text: northamptonshire 's police and crime commissioner , adam simmonds , is calling for an apology from an mp who alleges his force did not properly investigate child abuse claims against the late cyril smith mp .
simon danczuk mp claimed smith was stopped on the m1 in northamptonshire with child abuse images in his car , but northamptonshire police
mr simmonds , said the force was being `` maligned '' .
he said : `` northamptonshire police are not guilty of covering up a crime and indeed letting someone go on to perpetrate more .
everything in that book 's got to be evidence-led and -based , otherwise you are alerting people to the wrong information . ''
author: Andrew Woodger
BBC News Online

documents.title: cable theft in desborough
text: police are
they stole 35 reels of electrical cable , a generator , power leads , a power adaptor and a bag of tools .
the burglary happened overnight between monday , 27 july and tuesday , 28 july .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: newcastle close in on toney
text: it is understood newcastle united are closing in on a deal for northampton town striker ivan toney .
the 19-year-old forward , who became northampton 's youngest ever player at the age of 16 in 2012 , is set to be in the north east tomorrow ahead of any potential transfer .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: cyril smith witnesses 'could be fearful '
text: northamptonshire 's police and crime commissioner adam simmonds says mp simon danzcuk got much right in his book about cyril smith .
he also told me he is very supportive about what he has done to help fight child abuse .
but he says the force has been `` maligned '' over the claim smith was
he said : `` i guess it is possible cyril smith was stopped on the m1 and the people that know about it have n't come forward or are fearful .
but the fact is we 've gone to quite some lengths to prove whether it is true or is n't true '' .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: 'both involved ' in fight , say defence in rushden murder trial
text: at northampton crown court , the defence has been summing up at the murder trial of 27-year-old danny beaumont , who is accused of stabbing his friend steven smith , 23 , to death on 25 october last year .
the defence barrister told the court : `` it is palpably obvious that these two men had a fight over something - both were involved . ''
the trial continues .
author: Elinor Cross
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: cyril smith analysis
text: cyril smith was arrested on a motorway by police after they found child abuse images in his car .
fact or fiction ?
answer : do n't know .
after a lengthy investigation involving a detective sergeant and three experienced civilian investigators - led by the assistant chief constable of northamptonshire , police say they have been
amid continuing rumours about cover-ups at the top , police insist they faced no pressure from above during the course of their investigation .
but the outcome will not quell continuing speculation .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: minimum seat size for kettering taxis approved
text: a proposal to introduce a minimum seat size for taxis and private hire vehicles in kettering has been approved .
kettering borough council 's licensing committee agreed taxi seats should be no less than 400mm ( 16in ) wide .
local taxi drivers objected saying it would mean some cars would carry fewer passengers and their costs would increase .
the council said the new rule would apply to `` taxi vehicle licenses issued going forward '' .
author: Martin Borley
BBC Northampton

documents.title: academics say sekhemka statue sale 'sets dangerous precedent '
text: in a letter to the guardian newspaper
professor stephen quirke and dr richard bussmann from the ucl institute of archaeology and dr alice stevenson from the ucl petrie museum of egyptian archaeology say the council 's
can the public , museums and media act on these issues ?
or must we prepare for further losses from our public collections ? ''
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

he writes : `` the behemoths of the premier league may command most attention , but it 's further down the footballing food chain where bbc local radio comes into its own .
sports coverage is woven into the fabric of our 38 stations . ''
there will be

documents.title: 'knife wielder took it to another level , ' court hears
text: i 'm at northampton crown court for the murder trial of 27-year-old danny beaumont , accused of stabbing his friend steven smith , 23 , to death on 25 october last year .
the prosecution barrister in the case has just told the jury : `` this man is guilty of murder .
he is a knife wielder and he wielded a knife against a man who he thought was starting on him and he took it to another level . ''
the trial continues .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: murder accused 'has no remorse '
text: the prosecution in the case of danny beaumont , accused of murdering steven smith , 23 , say he `` exploded '' before stabbing his friend in the chest and back .

the jury at northampton crown court heard mr beaumont , 27 , `` intended to seriously injure '' mr smith , and `` has no remorse his only regret is that he is in the position that he is in - he is charged with murder '' .
mr smith died at trafford road in rushden on 25 october last year .
the trial continues .
author: Elinor Cross
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: prosecutors say rushden murder defendant is a 'liar '
text: i 'm at northampton crown court where prosecutors summing up in the trial of danny beaumont , charged with killing 23-year-old steven smith , say the defendant is a `` fabricator '' and `` selfish liar '' .
mr beaumont is accused of stabbing steven smith once in the chest and again in the back during a row at the victim 's rushden home last october .
mr beaumont denies murder and says mr smith `` came at him '' while he held the knife .
the prosecuting barrister said : `` if this case were n't so serious you would have to ask if this defendant was joking '' .
the trial continues .
author: Elinor Cross
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: anti-semitic incidents rise in uk , but not in northants
text: the number of reported anti-semitic incidents in the uk
in northamptonshire there were 14 recording anti-semitic incidents last year , but only one so far this year .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: cyril smith : 'someone is trying to suppress information '
text: journalist don hale , who has investigated cyril smith ( over child sex abuse allegations , has told the bbc `` someone is trying to suppress information '' on the former rochdale mp .
he was speaking in the wake of a decision by northamptonshire police
a book written by current rochdale mp simon danczuk says smith was released after making a telephone call to an unidentified third party in london .
mr hale said : `` the initial investigation was that the whole thing was covered up it is quite apparent it has gone full circle . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: rushden murder trial resumes
text: i 'm at the trial of a man charged with stabbing his friend to death , which has resumed at northampton crown court this morning .
danny beaumont , 27 , denies murdering 23-year-old steven smith .
the pair had been drinking together at the victim 's home in rushden last october .
mr beaumont says there was a row and that mr smith `` came at him '' and effectively impaled himself on the knife .
author: Elinor Cross
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: new hospital white coats welcomed
text: a recently qualified doctor from northampton general hospital is welcoming the idea that in future she 'll have to
dr emily mail told me : `` i think it 's a really good idea , i think they look really smart and professional and show patients and other members of staff who we are .
in an emergency situation people will know who we are and be able to call for help . ''
author: Willy Gilder
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: sekhemka export bar expired , but may be extended
text: the export ban on the 4,000-year-old sekhemka statue , which was sold for £ 15.76m by northampton borough council , expired at midnight .
the department for culture , media and sport ( dcms ) imposed the bar , which prevented it being taken overseas .
however ,
we have asked dcms if the export bar has been extended and they told us a decision will be made in due course .
more when we get it .
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: oundle are northamptonshire t20 champions
text: oundle town are this season 's northamptonshire league twenty20 champions .
they beat finedon by six wickets in last night 's final , which was reduced to 17 overs a side because of rain .
finedon posted 130-8 , but oundle reached their target with three balls to spare with man of the match , mark hodgson , hitting 53 .
the badgers will now represent northamptonshire against loughborough in the regional stages of the national competition on sunday .
author: Andrew Radd
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire win in one-day cup
text: northants opener josh cobb struck 86 to set up a 55-run
leicestershire folded to 189 all out as pacemen steven crook and olly stone took three wickets each .
stone ripped through leicestershire 's top order to reduce them to 7-3 , before crook up vital wickets in the middle order , including niall o'brien for 34 .
northamptonshire travel to derbyshire on friday in the one-day cup .
author: Alex Winter
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: police and fire integration 'can be done '
text: the new chief constable of northamptonshire police , simon edens , has been speaking to

mr edens , who was previously the deputy chief constable at leicestershire police , said : `` potentially [ blue-light integration ] can happen , it can be done and will be done in my time as chief constable . ''
author: BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: who was cyril smith ? 'mr rochdale ' used power to evade prosecution
text: we 've been looking into the background of former rochdale mp cyril smith this morning following news an investigation into claims he was found with child abuse images in his car boot on the m1 in northamptonshire
smith had been knighted for his public service in 1988 - the same year he announced he would not stand again for parliament .
when smith died in 2010 , hundreds of mourners turned out to a memorial service in rochdale for the man known as a `` champion '' of his hometown and `` mr rochdale '' .
but simon danczuk , rochdale 's current labour mp , claims smith used his powerful position to evade prosecution for sexually abusing boys .
investigations into those claims
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live

documents.title: who was cyril smith ? the 'blunt speaking liberal '

cyril smith , who died in 2010 , had been one of the
author: Pete Cooper

most places will
feeling warmer in the sunshine with light winds and a top temperature of 18c ( 64f ) .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
Presenter, BBC Weather

documents.title: cyril smith m1 case 'could have happened '
text: a probe into claims former rochdale mp cyril smith was found with child abuse images in his car boot
it was claimed the liberal mp , who died in 2010 , was stopped on the m1 in northamptonshire during the 1980s , but then released .

mr simmonds said : `` i 'm very alive to the fact that we have a system at the moment which is under incredible scrutiny on whether it tells the truth or not so i 'm not saying that this did n't happen because i do n't know whether it did or not .
at the moment the evidence tells me it did n't . ''
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: cyril smith m1 case could re-open
text: even though a probe into claims whether former rochdale mp cyril smith was found with child abuse images in his car boot
the claim that smith was stopped on the m1 in northamptonshire during the 1980s was made in a book on smith , who died in 2010 , written by current rochdale mp , labour 's simon danczuk .

northamptonshire police and crime commissioner adam simmonds told me : `` i think the police will still say if you do know something and you are hiding that information or you are fearful of your career or your current circumstances , regardless of that please come forward so they 're not closing this investigation in the sense that we are never looking at this again - if someone does come forward then they will look at it . ''
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: 'no evidence ' cyril smith was stopped on m1
text: the police and crime commissioner for northamptonshire adam simmonds told me allegations former mp cyril smith , was found with child abuse images in his car boot on the m1 in northamptonshire during the 1980s `` just could n't be left alone '' .
however ,
the claims surfaced in a book on smith , who died in 2010 , written by current rochdale mp , labour 's simon danczuk .

mr simmonds said : `` the police have reviewed extensively their own records , they 've asked lots of questions , they 've put out an amnesty for people to come forward to say they saw it , knew about it , perhaps they might be fearful of repercussions on themselves , come forward , tell us everything . ''
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: cyril smith m1 child abuse probe closed
text: a probe into claims the former rochdale mp cyril smith was found with child abuse images in his car boot
it has been claimed in a book on smith written by current rochdale mp , labour 's simon danczuk that he was then released after making a telephone call to an unidentified third party in london ,
but northamptonshire police said no witnesses had been found and no reports of the alleged incident were uncovered .
author: Sally Chidzoy
BBC East home affairs correspondent

documents.title: hello
text: morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire .

until 18:00 i 'll bring you the latest news , sport , travel and weather from across the county from the bbc newsroom in northampton - including breaking news that an investigation into claims the late rochdale mp cyril smith was found with child abuse images in his car boot has been closed .
if you have something to share , feel free to
author: Pete Cooper
Northamptonshire Live
